Detailed Description

Interface class for JSR309 Media Sessions.

All objects created from a media session runs on the same media server and can be joined together. Object created from a different media session objects are not guantied to run on the same media server and is not recommended to join object created from different media server session.

Member Function Documentation

virtual NetworkConnection* CreateNetworkConnection (  )  [pure virtual]

Create a network connection.

The application who creates the network connection owns the NetworkConnection object and it is responsible of releasing the NetworkConnection memory using the delete operator.
